markdown: ###### Moderate Positive reputation with the Principi | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = | conc = | next = Bounty - Kuaro | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_Principi_01 | guid = c0738a35-5756-43e2-b8ad-04f2465c0693 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Udita hired me to hunt down [Chornu](/chornu/), a Rauataian captain commanding the voyager ''[Early Muster](/theEarlyMuster/)''. There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. ## Walkthrough * A straightforward task. Chornu captains a lightly armed voyager that should go down quick. He sails in the waters north of [Neketaka](/neketaka/) and south of [Sayuka](/sayuka/). Simply sink him and return to Udita. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Principi_01.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Chornu''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Udita hired me to hunt down Chornu, a Rauataian captain commanding the voyager Early Muster. There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Chornu and take his ship's triumph.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Chornu and the voyager Early Muster frequent the waters north of Neketaka and south of Sayuka. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Udita.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Chornu's bounty is ready to collect. I can find Udita at Lifter's Refuge in Dunnage and claim my reward. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I dealt with Chornu and claimed the reward for his bounty. |}
